column1:
君は・・・助けに来て
くれたのか。齔
仲間があと３人、地下牢に
捕まっている。齔
俺は、傷を負ってしまった。
村に帰って、傷の手当を
しなくては・・・。齔
仲間を頼む。
column2:
You... have you
come to help us?\
There are three more of us
imprisoned in the dungeon.\
As for me, I got wounded.
I'll need to return to
the village for treatment.\
The others are
counting on you!

The others are
counting on you!
